title: Warwick Rework Teaser and Ability Breakdown

embed.description: My initial reaction to the Warwick Rework Teaser Trailer. I also break down the trailer to potential hints towards his new skills. I do not know if his skills are announced but I think I have a clear idea on what they could be. Also check out my Twitter: https://twitter.com/Templar_Wolves?lang=en

body: Speculations on Warwick's upcoming reworked abilities via the trailer breakdown.

replies.body: Would watch the video if you didn't use a click bot on this thread you filth
Woops my bad, But what's a click bot tho?
Idk why does this post hve 1.4k views?

Usually its because the post title is getting picked up when other players are googling Warwick abilities. This was up before anyone actually knew about skills and abilities so if players were searching they would have landed here.
That's really unnatural considering heartvine's post has the actual official abilities page yet that only has 181 views?
Yea soz for the inconvenience, tho I think in this case I am in the right. Right?
Yeah sorry mate gave the video a look and left a like {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

But now when you google it will come up with the ACTUAL website - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-warwick-uncaged-wrath

This post was up before there were any other posts/articles etc up about Warwick abilities. Some players definitely searched for rework abilities right after the teaser though.

Exactly what Marauder said.

This thread was up yesterday (within a few hours of the teaser video) when there was no official word on what even *might* happen with the new Warwick, and there were (no doubt) thousands of people trying to find some insight into what the new Warwick might look like.

My post, on the other hand, was up several hours after the official announcement (today) containing all of Warwicks new abilities, so anyone searching for them via search engines would find that long before they'd find my post.
I like the look and feel of the sprint. Thats kinda badass.
Makes you feel like your on the hunt you know. A better change to ww for sure.

>
> Makes you feel like your on the hunt you know. A better change to ww for sure.

100%

Thematically it fits in with his kit so well. And holy shit its like playing the cinematic in game! Deffo gonna give him a whirl.
Hell yea dude, as my names suggest. I am going back to the jungle roots
